# MX-Gathering: Community Resources and Thought Leadership

Open-source collaborative space for Machine Experience (MX) patterns.

**Repository:** https://github.com/Digital-Domain-Technologies-Ltd/MX-Gathering
**Author:** Tom Cranstoun "The MX Guy"
**Contact:** tom.cranstoun@gmail.com
**License:** MIT License (attribution required: "Based on Machine Experience (MX) patterns by Tom Cranstoun 'The MX Guy'")
